text: Beast is a 2022 American survival thriller movie directed by Baltasar Kormákur from a screenplay by Ryan Engle. It is based on a story by Jaime Primak Sullivan. The movie stars Idris Elba, Sharlto Copley, Iyana Halley, Leah Sava Jeffries, and Riley Keough. Recently widowed Dr. Nate Samuels and his two teenage daughters travel to a South African game reserve managed by Martin Battles, an old family friend and wildlife biologist. However, what begins as a journey of healing soon turns into a fearsome fight for survival when a lion, a survivor of bloodthirsty poachers, begins stalking them. Beast was released in the United States on August 19, 2022, by Universal Pictures. ==References== Category:2022 adventure movies Category:2022 thriller movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies about lions Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Baltasar Kormákur
